title: NEW! Gorgeously Remodeled Victorian Single Family Home w/2 Car Parking
posting_body: ['Mission District: Gorgeously Remodeled Victorian Single Family Home w/ 2 Car Parking', 'Property Address', '2523 Harrison St. | San Francisco, CA 94110', 'Available: Now', 'Offered By', 'SF City Rents, PC |', 'show contact info', 'Description', 'Take a 3D tour here: <URL>', '**To schedule an in-person tour at your preferred times, go to: <URL>', 'This 3-story Victorian home has been lovingly restored and thoughtfully renovated with all the modern upgrades you are looking for.', 'Features include:', '- kitchen, living/family room, dining room plus a double parlor w/ fireplace on main level (double parlor is not included in bedroom count)', '- 2 bedrooms on top level including one with a deck', '- 3 bedrooms on ground level', '- 4 fully remodeled bathrooms with Moroccan tile floors', '- restored period details', '- two decks + back yard', '- tremendous amount of entertaining/living/working space', '- designer chef’s kitchen with marble countertops, restored Wedgewood stove, farmhouse sink and massive island', '- primary suite on lower level with ensuite bath, walk-in closet, and direct access to yard', '- office nook on top level', '- laundry machines are on lower level, where most of the bedrooms are located', '- closets galore, many with storage systems', '- spacious one car garage with storage closets', '- driveway parking for a compact car', 'Located in the best part of the Mission District:', '- just a few blocks to countless popular bars and restaurants such as Flour + Water, Trick Dog, True Laurel, Farmhouse Thai, Tartine Manufactory, Southern Pacific, etc.', '- short walk to art galleries in and around 20th Street', '- 2 blocks to 24th', 'Street staples such as Philz Coffee, Humphry Slocombe and Wise Sons Deli', '- directly across from Moscone Elementary', 'Terms:', '- 12 month lease', '- pets considered on a case-by-case basis', '- tenant pays all utilities', '- non-smoking rental', '- square footage is approximate', 'We look forward to hearing from you!', 'SF City Rents', 'DRE# 02187202 (please don’t use the DRE# to request a showing; instead provide the property address: 2523 Harrison)', 'This unit is a rental unit subject to the San Francisco Rent Ordinance, which limits evictions without just cause, and which states that any waiver by a tenant of their rights under the Rent Ordinance is void as contrary to
